source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video begins with a view of a double rainbow in the sky, with the camera panning from right to left. The rainbow is clearly visible against a backdrop of trees and power lines. As the camera continues to move, more of the rainbow and the surrounding environment come into view, including additional trees and power lines. The camera then reveals a street scene with houses and a fence, while the rainbow remains prominent in the sky.
